name: Proton VPN
description: A privacy-first virtual private network with strong encryption and a no-logs policy.

name: Tor Browser
description: A browser that routes traffic through the Tor network to protect anonymity.

name: DuckDuckGo
description: A search engine that does not store personal data or track user activity.

name: Brave
description: A secure browser that blocks trackers, ads, and invasive scripts by default.

name: Proton Mail
description: End-to-end encrypted email service built for privacy and security.

name: Signal
description: Encrypted messaging app with open-source security protocols.

name: Tutanota
description: Secure email platform with built-in end-to-end encryption.

name: Bitwarden
description: Open-source password manager with cross-device encryption.

name: KeePass
description: Offline password vault with strong local encryption.

name: KeePassXC
description: Cross-platform open-source password manager fork of KeePass.

name: OpenVPN
description: Open-source VPN protocol and client for secure networking.

name: WireGuard
description: Lightweight VPN protocol designed for high-speed secure connections.

name: NextDNS
description: Privacy-focused DNS service that blocks trackers and malicious domains.

name: SimpleLogin
description: Email aliasing service to protect your real inbox from spam and tracking.

name: Have I Been Pwned
description: Breach detection service that checks if your data was exposed online.

name: Privacy Badger
description: Browser extension that blocks invisible trackers automatically.

name: uBlock Origin
description: Lightweight ad and tracker blocking extension for secure browsing.

name: NoScript
description: Browser add-on that blocks scripts to prevent malicious code execution.

name: HTTPS Everywhere
description: Forces websites to use encrypted HTTPS connections.

name: ClamAV
description: Open-source antivirus engine for malware detection.

name: OSSEC
description: Open-source host-based intrusion detection system.

name: Snort
description: Open-source network intrusion prevention system.

name: Wireshark
description: Network traffic analyzer for security inspection and diagnostics.

name: GnuPG
description: Encryption tool for securing files and communications.

name: VeraCrypt
description: Open-source disk encryption software for data protection.

name: BleachBit
description: Privacy cleaner that removes cache, cookies, and logs securely.

name: OnionShare
description: Secure file sharing over the Tor network.

name: Session
description: Decentralized private messenger with no phone number required.

name: Librewolf
description: Hardened Firefox-based browser with privacy defaults.

name: Qubes OS
description: Security-focused operating system using isolation for protection.

name: Tails OS
description: Live operating system that routes all traffic through Tor.
